entry.title: Surgery on Code from the Command Line

link.title: Surgery on Code from the Command Line

entry.summary: One problem that comes up all the time for me is needing to manipulate files only on specific lines. Like, “find and replace this pattern, but only on specific lines.” In this post, I’ll introduce the CLI tools I’ve made to solve this class of problems with some examples.
